Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Mention \Men"tion\ (m[e^]n"sh[u^]n), v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Mentioned} (m[e^]n"sh[u^]nd); p. pr. & vb. n. {Mentioning}.] [Cf. F. mentionner.] To make mention of; to speak briefly of; to name. [1913 Webster]
I will mention the loving-kindnesses of the Lord. --Is. lxiii. 7. [1913 Webster]
